item.title: About Colgan Commodities
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A Futures and Commodities Broker
Specializing in Hedging Risk

Colgan Commodities is a futures and commodities brokerage firm specializing in working with agricultural producers to help them hedge price risk. Our mission is to provide you with the tools you need to market your products using the experience, knowledge and research we bring to every partnership. As an Guaranteed Independent Broker of ADM Investor Services Inc., you’ll receive the stability of one of the largest clearing firms along with the research, technology and benefits they provide—with the personal service of Marty Colgan and the team at Colgan Commodities. Learn more about our services and we look forward to learning more about your needs.

Marty Colgan

I grew up in Wyoming, Illinois (near Peoria). My agricultural experience started behind the parts counter of my father’s John Deere dealership. I attended the University of Illinois and majored in Agricultural Business. After college, I spent eight years in the cash grain industry beginning with Pillsbury as a country elevator merchandiser and worked my way up to managing one of their Mississippi River terminals that handled 25 million bushels per year. I also traded barge freight for Ferruzzi in New Orleans and West coast grain markets for Scoular Grain. Today, as your commodities broker, I bring more than 20 years of brokerage experience working primarily with producers to help hedge their risk and build their business. I have worked with some of the largest brokerage firms including Pillsbury Commodity Services, Linnco, REFCO, and MF Global, before establishing Colgan Commodities in 2008 as a Guaranteed Independent Broker of ADM Investor Services Inc. You’ll find that I am a dedicated, competent, and highly ethical commodity futures broker who will work closely with you to earn and grow your business. I can be reached by phone at 800-676-2789, by email at: marty@colgancommodities.com and by Yahoo IM at: colgancommodities View NFA registration for Colgan Commodities »

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: About Colgan Commodities and Owner Marty Colgan. Futures Brokerage specializing in ag hedging services.
colgan commodities, commodities brokerage, futures trading, marty colgan, hedging, ag risk management

item.title: Commodities Trading
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A risk management tool for every producer.

The current business environment is full of risk. Some we can see, and others we can’t. As a producer you need to use every tool at your disposal to reduce the price risk to your business. Commodity trading is an integral part of your agricultural marketing and risk management toolkit. When trading commodities, each day you’ll know exactly where you stand. Do you really know the financial status of your local elevator, ethanol plant, feed plant or feedlot? In one day you can liquidate your positions and have your money deposited back into your account. Can you do that with a cash sale to your local elevator or ethanol plant? Use the futures and options to hedge your grain and improve your marketing for the coming year. Don't get locked into a single market. Go where you want, when you want, by hedging.

Hedge Program

Colgan Commodities specializes in working with agricultural producers to reduce your price risk and hedge markets with commodities trading. I can customize a hedge program, encompassing both futures and options, to meet your individual needs.
  • Every hedger has a different goal. I can customize a hedge program to fit your business plan.
  • I have over 30 years of grain merchandising and hedging experience
  • My client base stretches from Ohio to Nebraska and from Wisconsin to Kansas. I also have clients in Canada and overseas. I talk with clients through out the entire grain belt and overseas. I am not looking out my own back door.
Additionally, all Colgan Commodities clients will receive the Colgan AudioCast—a daily periodic voicemail sent to your phone with brief market updates, insight, and commentary. Free Consultation - Contact Us ➟ Free 30-day trial of Colgan AudioCast ➟

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Commodities Trading and Hedging Services for Farmers and Food Producers

item.title: Colgan AudioCast
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The Colgan AudioCast is a daily, periodic voicemail sent to your phone with brief market updates, insight, and commentary. Produced and delivered by Marty Colgan, this broadcast contacts everyone simultaneously. No matter if your name starts with A or Z, everyone is called at the same time. Both large and small clients get the same information immediately. Each call lasts a maximum of 90 seconds making it short, concise and to the point. Since it is a recording, you can listen at your convenience. This exclusive market commentary is free for all clients, or available for $240/year.

Morning sample

http://beta.colgancommodities.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/2012-03-27-Morning-Sample.mp3

Afternoon sample

http://beta.colgancommodities.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/2012-03-27-Afternoon-Sample.mp3

Sign-up for a FREE 30-day trial or purchase now!

item.title: Open Account
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
It's easy to get your account open, just follow the two steps below.

1. Complete Your Application

There are two easy ways to open an account:

  • Complete the Online Application (fastest results)
  • Complete the Application manually (Contact Us)

2. Fund Your Account

Contact us at (800) 676-2789 with any questions

Thank you for choosing Colgan Commodities as your Commodities Broker, we look forward to working with you.

Additional Account Documents

  • Account Transfer Form
  • Power of Attorney (managed account)
  • Risk Disclosure (Customer Copy)
  • Additional Risk Form
  • Security Hedge Agreement Form
  • Custodial Account Agreement Form
  • CPO Exemption Notice
  • Sub-Account Request Form
  • Foreign Tax Form (W-8 BEN)
  • Instructions - Foreign Tax Form (W-8 BEN)
